TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 36 cts vs 39 cts Oper net 1,391,000 vs 1,485,000 Revs 61.6 mln vs 58.5 mln YEAR Oper shr 70 cts vs 1.16 dlrs Oper net 2,677,000 vs 4,410,000 Revs 207.6 mln vs 200.2 mln Note: 1986 net excludes extraordinary loss of 297,000 dlrs or eight cts shr vs yr-ago gain of 514,000 dlrs or 13 cts shr.
